Hank Quinlan, Horrible Cop, Launches Site

30 Apr 2014

Well. Finally got around to putting this old website together. Neat thing about it - powered by Jekyll and I can use Markdown to author my posts. It actually is a lot easier than I thought it was going to be. Thanks to the help of the JONATHAN MCGLONE @ http://jmcglone.com/guides/github-pages/.
